post.body: Think there's a country song about exes creepin in beds. Reminded by @themia whose tweeting country RIGHT NOW - but not *that* song
Bittter hamster
I nominate @bettydraper for a Shorty Award in #entertainment bc she may not bring home the bacon but she fries it up in a pan.
WOW! Why is that a turn on to me? SO SICK! Anyways..we all know that, but for the 2nd offense? An eggplant up the rectum?
I KNOW they don't sell that shit at Zappos! But nonetheless you're my hero.
his ability to make a girl a little neurotic about her appearance are well...unsurpassed. Ah! Twitter Therapy! btw? I love my twisted Dad
Any of you just blow up my picture to see whether or not I do indeed have fish lips? While his lip & thigh comments were unwarranted...
I think he was trying to get me to shoot myself in the backyard but that's just a guess.
I think he gave me that pearl of wisdom within a month of calling me fish lips & telling me that my thighs were my worst attribute.
Better to be quiet and let people THINK you're stupid than to open your mouth and let them know for sure.
I always pick up followers when I take a couple of days off which reinforces 1 of those things that my father said to build my self esteem:
I'm doing this all to The Chipmunks at Christmas because I find it appropos
The bubble burst & the first water drips are plunking onto the floor. I have decided to eat myself to death & I'm starting with Snickers.
The bubble is growing on the ceiling. How far DOES paint stretch?
my fucking ROOF IS LEAKING. I'm trying to stay calm. I will not throw up on the roofer that was supposed to fix it right the LAST TIME.
Do I appear to have THAT big of a mouth? It's ONE thing to kiss & tell..it's another to uh....you know....this & that...well...I can't tell
Can I just say that Dallas was seriously concerned that I would put details of our sexcapades on Twitter?
I cannot stop eating. Using holidays as excuse. Just made mocha coffee - keep putting more whipped cream on top. Like whipped cream soup.
Deoderant smells SO good! Why? no no no no....I don't want nasty answers to that. I'm having quality time with my Dove Stick.
Is a friend on Twitter a Fritter?
WHAT is the difference between me and super neat people? I mean other than the dog hair & the piles of paperwork?
Feedback I'm getting is that I'm fucked - does that mean literally or figuratively b/c they're at different ends of the spectrum
What does THAT mean?
On Facebook changing ur relationship status is as easy as a drop down menu. Fab. But what if only 1 of you changes ur status?
I think I'll do leg lifts while I eat cheese puffs
Just did the ULTIMATE act of justification: stood, eating chocolate covered peanuts while doing butt clenches
Laugh if you will but Britney Spears is great in bed. I know what that sounds like and I'm just going to let you take that wrong.
Too emotionally healthy is NOT sexy. I worried that might happen to me - but then reality struck: ME? emotionally healthy? MWAAH HAAA HAA
OMFG I thought @avflox was telling us someone had PEED into her soul! Then I thought...what is that like? And I knew...she would tell us!
Of course that makes me a MASTER at avoiding holiday family get togethers. A MASTER!!! Next year? I'll have an appedectomy on Xmas Day
Scheduled wisdom tooth removal on xmas Eve. Dad says last night: "there's something WRONG with YOU!". uh...pops? you're just noticing?
Circling my to do list - poking it to see if it will bite me or if I can turn my back on it.
http://themia.org/rocks/?p=274 I'd tip em each a dollar. Is it an excercise class - like Jane Fonda - but more like Jane Fondle?
Somethin tells me that @sunshynegrll has read the "Beauty" series-tends to put ideas in your head. Not that it's a bad thing
The roofer came today. That voodoo doll worked!!!! Especially the long needle in the gynecological area. AAAAARG!!! FIX MY ROOF MATEY!
Only getting reply tweets to me specifically.
WAIT - is anyone but me not gettng reply tweets?
How long did I amuse myself with this? OMG! http://www.motionportrait.com/about/TIdog.swf I'm a moron - and now you can be one too!
oh YEAH! Dallas just told me she likes me better than chicken liver! Now THAT is somthing to be proud of. That makes ME a tasty treat!
Last minute gift ideas? From stocking stuffers to stuffed stockings or a stuffed midget... or a midget to stuff? Follow @jennytalia
